29 void Controller::Execute() {
30  //TODO add more requirements
31 
32  CheckTarget();
33  if (targetDetected) {
34  CheckQRCode();
35  if (qrCodeDetected) {
36  DriveTo(currentTarget);
37  PickUpTarget();
38  DriveTo("destination");
39  DropTarget();
40  } else {
41  std::cout << "QR code not detected. Cannot proceed." << std::endl;
42  }
43  } else {
44  std::cout << "No target detected." << std::endl;
45  }
46 
47  CheckObstacle();
48  if (obstacleDetected = true){
49  Stop();
50  std::cout << "Obstacle in Path. Program Treminated." << std::endl;
51  } else {
52  std::cout << "Path Clear" << std::endl;
53  }
54 
55  CheckBattery();
56  if(batteryLevel = true){
57  std::cout << "Sufficient Battery Level." << std::endl;
58  } else {
59  Charge();
60  std::cout << "Battery Low. Returning to Charging Bay" << std::endl;
61  }
62 }

94 void Controller::DriveTo(const std::string& location) {
95  std::cout << "Driving to " << location << "..." << std::endl;
96  // Add driving logic here
97 
98  cmd_vel_pub = rospublisher('/cmd_vel', 'geometry_msgs/Twist');
99  pose_sub = rossubscriber('/odom', 'nav_msgs/Odometry');
100 
101  // Create a Twist message for the desired velocity command
102  cmd_msg = rosmessage(cmd_vel_pub);
103 
104  send(cmd_vel_pub, cmd_msg);
105 
106  // Get the current pose of the robot
107  pose = receive(pose_sub);
108 
109  current_x = pose.Pose.Pose.Position.X
110  current_y = pose.Pose.Pose.Position.Y
111 
112  delta_x = target_x - current_x
113  delta_y = target_y - current_y
114 
115  targetYaw = atan2(delta_y, delta_x)
116 
117  currentOrientation = quat2eul([pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.W, ...
118  pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.X, pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.Y, ...
119  pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.Z]);
120 
121  % Extract the current yaw angle
122  CurrentRotation = currentOrientation(1)
123 
124  delta_yaw = targetYaw - CurrentRotation
125  delta_yaw_deg = rad2deg(delta_yaw)
126 
127  % Set the angular velocity to make the TurtleBot rotate
128  cmd_msg.Angular.Z = turningSpeed; % Adjust the value as needed
129  if delta_yaw_deg < 0
130  % If rotation is negative, swap direction
131  cmd_msg.Angular.Z = -cmd_msg.Angular.Z;
132  end
133 
134  % Publish the command to start the rotation
135  send(cmd_vel_pub, cmd_msg);
136 
137  angleTolerance = 0.05;
138  % Keep rotating until the angle difference is within tolerance
139  while abs(delta_yaw_deg) > angleTolerance
140  % Get the current orientation from the pose subscriber
141  pose = receive(pose_sub);
142  currentOrientation = quat2eul([pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.W, ...
143  pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.X, pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.Y, ...
144  pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.Z]);
145  CurrentRotation = currentOrientation(1); % Extract the yaw angle
146 
147  % Calculate the updated angle difference
148  delta_yaw_deg = targetYaw - CurrentRotation;
149  if delta_yaw_deg > pi * 2
150  delta_yaw_deg = delta_yaw_deg - pi * 2;
151  end
152  disp(delta_yaw_deg);
153 
154  % Pause briefly to control the loop rate
155  pause(0.02);
156  end
157 
158  cmd_msg.Angular.Z = 0;
159  send(cmd_vel_pub, cmd_msg);
160 
161 }
